characters: Driver of a silver sedan, driver of a white truck
summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving on a busy highway. A silver sedan is directly ahead, and a white truck is on the right side. The traffic is dense, and the vehicles are moving at a moderate speed. The white truck on the right side appears to be merging into the lane of the self-driving vehicle.
actions: The self-driving vehicle is maintaining a consistent speed while keeping a safe distance from the silver sedan ahead. The vehicle is also monitoring the white truck on the right side, which is attempting to merge into the lane.
key_objects: 1) Front: A silver sedan, approximately 5 meters away, maintaining a steady speed. 2) Right: A white truck, approximately 3 meters away, attempting to merge into the lane.
